To install scMiko, [R](https://www.r-project.org/) version 4.0 or greater is required. We also recommend installing [R Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/).

# Install
 
To install, run: 

```{r eval = FALSE}
# Enter commands in R (or R studio, if installed)
devtools::install_github(repo = "NMikolajewicz/scMiko")
library(scMiko)
```
